color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内存分配一般有两种方式：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">非入侵式，内存分配器自行先申请内存（和栈配合使用），用作记录用户层的申请记录（地址，大小）。</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">用户释放空间时会查找该表，除了知道释放空间大小外还能判断该指针是合法。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">入侵式，例如用户要申请</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1byte</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的内存，而内存分配器会分配</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5byte</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">的空间（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">32</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">位），前面</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4byte</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">用于申请的大小。释放内存时会先向前偏移</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">byte</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">找到申请大小，再进行释放。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">两种方法各有优缺点，第一种安全，但慢。第二种快但对程序员的指针控制能力要求更高，稍有不慎越界了会对空间信息做成破坏。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">绝大多数的分配器会采用第一种方式实现，而操作系统级的分配器采用了虚拟等方式，可能要记录更多信息。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">五</span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span></b><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">最后分析自定义数组类型</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">那么数组的<b>分配和释放</b>是</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">怎么自动的</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:
minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <b>4 </b></span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;

宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <b>4</b></span><b><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的呢？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1 </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"Helvetica Neue";

color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">operator new</span><span style="font-size:

mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt">分配堆空间</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left" style="margin: 15pt 0cm; background-color: white; background-position: initial initial; background-repeat: initial initial;"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">调用构造代理函数构造堆对象，在调用构造代理函数时，通过压栈，像其传递了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Helvetica Neue",sans-serif;

"Helvetica Neue";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#333333;
